title: Intern - Employer Branding
jd: Be an Undergraduate/Fresh Graduate following/completed a Degree or equivalent professional qualification.
Have excellent proficiency in written & spoken English.
Ability to represent Unilever Sri Lanka externally in Universities & conduct learning sessions for Undergraduates.
Have a passion towards digital media, social media content creation and creative story telling.
Have high bias for action, creativity, confidence & ability to meet deadlines while working with multiple stakeholders
